name: PNC00001 UCB-J consortium
description: Collection of PET data using the 11C-UCB-J tracer for imaging the synaptic vesicle glycoprotein 2A. This consortium brings together multiple datasets from different research centers studying synaptic density using UCB-J PET imaging.

Description: Collection of PET data using the 11C-UCB-J tracer for imaging the synaptic vesicle glycoprotein 2A
License: Data User Agreement - restricted access until 2027
Information: To access those UCB-J data, you must be a partner in the consortium. Contact: Koen Vanlaere
